summary: A command-line script that loads a citation network (Cora, Citeseer, or Pubmed) using DGL, constructs an ARMA graph convolutional model, and trains it on the full graph for node classification with PyTorch.
business_intent: Provide a reference implementation for training an ARMA‑based graph neural network on standard citation datasets, helping researchers and developers understand and reproduce full‑graph GNN training.
